enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The client is planning to get pregnant in next month-76

ValueSet-IMMZD5DTRubellaContraindication.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD5DTRubellaContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD5DTRubellaContraindicationsVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
